summary: A woman's terribly dull life is upended by a one-night stand pregnancy, causing her to seek retribution.
cast: Kati Outinen|Elina Salo|Esko Nikkari|Vesa Vierikko|Reijo Taipale|Silu Seppälä|Outi Mäenpää|Marja Packalén|Richard Reitinger|Helka Viljanen|Kurt Siilas|Ismo Keinänen|Klaus Heydemann|Erkki Friman|Tapani Ikonen|Jari Lappalainen|Lasse Luoto
title: La chica de la fábrica de cerillas
